meanings.definition: A group of four people or things.
meanings.sent1: We split into two quads to work on the project efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The quads of friends went on a hike together.
meanings.sent3: The quads of ducks waddled in perfect formation.
meanings.sent4: The quads of trees at the park created a symmetrical pattern.
meanings.sent5: The quads of colors in the painting blended harmoniously.

meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her quads after running the marathon.
meanings.sent2: He focused on strengthening his quads at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The quads in his legs protested after the intense workout.
meanings.sent4: Her quads felt like jelly after the long bike ride.
meanings.sent5: The quads in his thighs bulged with each step he took.

meanings.sent1: The school courtyard formed a perfect quads for outdoor events.
meanings.sent2: The garden was designed in the shape of a quads.
meanings.sent3: The quads of the building enclosed a peaceful garden.
meanings.sent4: The field was divided into quads for different sports activities.
meanings.sent5: The map displayed the city divided into colorful quads.
